DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer patient type 2 diabetes Nonsmoking , Caucasian African American , male female ( postmenopausal , surgically sterile use doublebarrier method contraception ) subject 30 65 year age ( inclusive ) Type 2 diabetic metformin and/or sufonylurea History type 1 diabetes insulin use History coagulation abnormality History abnormal heart condition Pregnancy breastfeed Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
